channel.title: Moparisthebest RPG to Rival Sythe.org's
channel.description:
Most of you may have heard that the Sythe.org community is [u]attempting[/u] to make a 3D RPG. In my opinion, I think it will fail. I think we should develop our own RPG, based on something like the Eclipse RPG maker, or maybe something a little more complex. [b]If you don't like the idea of us rivaling them, just making an RPG for the fun of the community.[/b]
Post if you support or do not support. If you don't/do support please post why/why not.
Edit: Goatee has a good point there. Edit: Thug Life, I specifically said if you don't care, then just to make an RPG for our community for fun. Please read. Edit: Frank, very true Edit: Dragon, true, but there will always be ignorant bastards as long as the internet exists.

item.title: Moparisthebest RPG to Rival Sythe.org's
item.dc:creator: @dragonfire455 dragonfire455
item.description:
@dragonfire455 wrote:

[quote=“m.dog311, post:69, topic:228617”][quote author=magma link=topic=300630.msg2417995#msg2417995 date=1220218372]

I think we should start manufactioring MITB brand shoes

Or we should make a type of clothes or something
[/quote]like http://store.havenworld.co.uk ??!!

Yes. Except mitb might be able to sell something, because unlike havenworld, mitb doesn’t suck. Also, if this community does ever attempt a “community project” make it opensource, but it on a certain set of boards, and make people have to prove there not absolute tards before they can view the board.[/quote]Agreed.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparisthebest RPG to Rival Sythe.org's
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“magma, post:1, topic:229084”][quote author=pk4pk link=topic=300630.msg2417902#msg2417902 date=1220216248]
I think we should start manufactioring MITB brand shoes

Or we should make a type of clothes or something
[/quote]like http://store.havenworld.co.uk ??!![/quote]
Yes. Except mitb might be able to sell something, because unlike havenworld, mitb doesn’t suck. Also, if this community does ever attempt a “community project” make it opensource, put it on a certain set of boards, and make people have to prove there not absolute tards before they can view the board. (we would still have 40+ people able to work on it, but the noobs who dl it change the name on it don’t get a hold of it)

Read full topic

item.title: Moparisthebest RPG to Rival Sythe.org's
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Ckstunner:

“we” Dont do anything, I hate people who do that, like when the football team or whatever is like their town, Like the Tampa Bay Bucs, Where I live, I hate when people say WE beat the texans and crap, It’s stupid, WE don’t do anything, THEY do, And anyways on topic, the Moparscape staff or whoever is going to do this “RPG”, shouldn’t, Because, Most people that are on the mopar forums will probally join Sythe and say we Fail, If whoever is making the RPG can’t do it, So anyways, No we shouldnt!

Trevor and I run tampa bay, so don’t try anything.

I’m on a representative of a side… omg uber happiness is coming out my vagina!

[quote=“Ckstunner, post:21, topic:228617”][quote author=goatee link=topic=300630.msg2412936#msg2412936 date=1220019602]
I don’t support… if “WE” are going to do something as a community it should at least be original.
[/quote]

“we” Dont do anything, I hate people who do that, like when … (kind of spiraled into a jealous fit of rage against the cool kids in his town here)[/quote]

And Ummm… what did you want me to say?

“If the moparisthebest community (which according to CKstunner I am not part of) is going to do anything as a community (That according to a tard called CK[size=1pt]unt[/size]stunner I’m not a part of) it should at least be original.” ?

Say yes… and you get a free kiss and a free anul.
